data.comment: The match has started.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Torreon.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
In the minute 6, Octavio Rivero of Santos Laguna gets in a strike, but is off target.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Mazatlan.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Important block from the Mazatlan defence as Bryan Garnica fires in a strike for Santos Laguna.
In the minute 9, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna's David Andrade misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 13, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 17, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio TSM Corona.
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio TSM Corona.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mazatlan's Camilo Sanvezzo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 37, Jose Ortiz is booked for the away team.
Santos Laguna are pushing forward but Alan Cervantes's finish is wide of the goal.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio TSM Corona.
Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Santos Laguna.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Torreon.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Santos Laguna.
The home team have replaced Bryan Garnica with Carlos Orrantia. This is the first substitution made today by Jorge Guillermo Almada.
In the minute 48, Mazatlan are pushing forward but Jorge Valdivia's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 49, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Hugo Rodriguez.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
In the minute 52, Jose Ortiz has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Santos Laguna.
The away team replace Jorge Valdivia with Gonzalo Jara.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 58, Fernando Gorriaran for Santos Laguna has been booked by Cesar Arturo Ramos and receives a first yellow card.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Great finish from Jose van Rankin to give Santos Laguna a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 61, Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In Torreon, Santos Laguna push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Mazatlan make their second substitution with Rodrigo Millar replacing Martin Rodriguez.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 66, Mazatlan's Israel Jimenez breaks free at Estadio TSM Corona. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
In Torreon Santos Laguna attack through Julio Furch. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 69, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Jorge Guillermo Almada (Santos Laguna) is making a second substitution, with Eduardo Aguirre replacing Octavio Rivero.
Jorge Guillermo Almada is making the team's third substitution at Estadio TSM Corona with Diego Valdes replacing Alan Cervantes.
In the minute 74, Fernando Aristeguieta is replacing Camilo Sanvezzo for the away team.
Carlos Vargas is on a sub for Efrain Velarde for Mazatlan.
Cesar Huerta is replacing Luis Mendoza for Mazatlan at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 77, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Throw-in high up the field for Santos Laguna in Torreon.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Mazatlan.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a throw-in for Santos Laguna, close to Mazatlan's area.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 83, Mazatlan push upfield but Cesar Arturo Ramos quickly pulls them for offside.
Santos Laguna make their fourth substitution with Jesus Ocejo replacing Julio Furch.
Ronaldo Prieto is replacing David Andrade for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Great shot from Santos Laguna's Jesus Ocejo but he is denied by the crossbar.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Goal! Santos Laguna extend their lead to 3-0 through Hugo Rodriguez.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
An attacking Santos Laguna player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
It's 4-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Nicolas Diaz (Mazatlan) has received a yellow card from Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Fernando Gorriaran nets and Santos Laguna extend their lead to 4-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
